attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was HIGHLY embarassing and annoying to watch a visiting dignatory (Obama) driven round London in a Mercedes when we make Rolls Royce, Bentley, Jaguar and RangeRover in Britain. 
The money spent on a GERMAN van did not benefit our economy at all, if it had been spent on a BRITISH built vehicle that manfacturer would have employed people and thus saved on unemployment benefit, invested money in the UK and paid UK taxes.
The PM should FORCE the government, police, ambulance, fire, councils, army etc. be FORCED to buy BRITISH with BRITISH tax payers money the economy of BRITAIN would be in better shape and my taxes woudl be a LOT lower.
While putting this in motion the PM should appologise for wasting our money, and should also remember that in Germany the police ONLY use German, in France ONLY French, Swedish ONLY Swedish etc. etc. etc.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
